short_description: This outputs descriptive statistics for local partitions.
long_description: This outputs descriptive statistics values for each partition.

output_tables.name: MomentsTableName
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table name for MOMENTS group of statistical measures.
output_tables.description: Specifies the table name for MOMENTS group of statistical measures.

output_tables.name: BasicTableName
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table name for BASIC group of statistical measures.
output_tables.description: Specifies the table name for BASIC group of statistical measures.

output_tables.name: QuantilesTableName
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table name for QUANTILES group of statistical measures.
output_tables.description: Specifies the table name for QUANTILES group of statistical measures.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies input table columns that contain numeric values to calculate statistics for.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies input table columns that contain numeric values to calculate statistics for.

argument_clauses.name: ExcludeColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies table columns which should be ignored, the rest of numeric columns in the table will be used as target variables.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies table columns which should be ignored, the rest of numeric columns in the table will be used as target variables.

argument_clauses.name: PartitionColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies columns which define groups for which statistics is calculated.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies columns which define groups for which statistics is calculated.

argument_clauses.name: StatisticsGroups
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifying groups of statistical measures to include in the response.
argument_clauses.description: Specifying groups of statistical measures to include in the response.

argument_clauses.name: SequenceInputBy
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
